original_text: He asked some men who lived there, ‘Where is the temple prostitute who sat by the road at Enaim?’ But the men said, ‘There has not been any prostitute here.’
korean_text: 그가 그 곳 사람에게 물어 이르되 길 곁 에나임에 있던 창녀가 어디 있느냐 그들이 이르되 여기는 창녀가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: He asked some men who lived there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에 사는 몇몇 남자들에게 물었습니다

sentences.original_text: who sat by the road at Enaim?’
‘There has not been any prostitute here.’
